sentence.Network_en: A city of central Mali near the Niger River northeast of Bamako.
sentence.Network_cn: 马里中部一城市,靠近尼日乐河,位于巴马科东北部.

sentence.Network_en: Bamako is the capital and the largest city.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴马科是其首都和最大的城市.

sentence.Network_en: The picture shows the Bamako Convention Building.
sentence.Network_cn: 图为马里巴马科会议大厦.
